tool_calls.input_summary: {"title": "Absorb self-improve skill into introspect and renumber levels", "body": "Merge `/self-improve` into `/introspect` so the hierarchy is unified. The document produced during `/update-and-arch...

input_full.title: Absorb self-improve skill into introspect and renumber levels
input_full.body:
Merge `/self-improve` into `/introspect` so the hierarchy is unified. The document produced during `/update-and-archive` becomes "introspect 1" (L1), simplifying the mental model and tooling surface.

This change:
- Eliminates a separate skill entry point (`/self-improve`) in favor of a single `/introspect` command with level-based dispatching
- Makes the introspection hierarchy more intuitive: L1 = archive summary (currently done by `/update-and-archive`), L2+ = progressively higher meta-analysis
- Reduces the number of skills to learn and maintain

---
Created with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
